page.title: 01Rural Area Sth of Nantwich
page.content: The main occupation of the area is dairy farming, with the next main employer being the Abattoir by Sound Common. The Common is approximately 20 acres and is designated a site of special Scientific Interest as an area of lowland heath. The farms are mostly 100 to 150 acres with fields averaging 10 acres (range 3 to 20 acres). The main area of occupation is the small village of Ravensmoor, but there are no shops so the villagers, together with the other inhabitants of the area do their shopping in Nantwich or Crewe. Those inhabitants not connected with agriculture either work in Nantwich or Crewe two and six miles away respectively.
